General.Name: MEGA International Development Co Ltd
General.Description: MEGA International Development Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, rental, and sale of residences and buildings in Taiwan. It is also involved in the cultural and creative; and hotel businesses. The company was formerly known as Magic Information Display Technology Corp. and changed its name to MEGA International Development Co.,Ltd. in June 2006. MEGA International Development Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
